Detailed Description

Data structure defines the MCAN error logging counters status.

Field Documentation

CAN Error Logging

uint32_t CANFD_MCANErrCntStatus_t::recErrCnt

Receive Error Counter

uint32_t CANFD_MCANErrCntStatus_t::rpStatus

Receive Error Passive 0 = The Receive Error Counter is below the error passive level(128) 1 = The Receive Error Counter has reached the error passive level(128)
